mapper.insert: insert into portfolio (port_id, port_exp, port_skill, port_award, port_link, port_license, user_id) values(portfolio_seq.nextval, #{port_exp}, #{port_skill}, #{port_award}, #{port_link}, #{port_license}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update portfolio set port_exp=#{port_exp}, port_skill=#{port_skill}, port_award=#{port_award}, port_link=#{port_link}, port_license=#{port_license}, where port_id = #{port_id}
mapper.select: select port_id, port_exp, port_skill, port_award, port_link, port_license, user_id from portfolio where port_id = #{port_id}

select count(*) from portfolio
order by port_id desc
